analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/16/0xc7ff1e126cc81e816915ff48c940ed9d4e6d05d6.sol:
	Contract IJC has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/16/0xc7ff1e126cc81e816915ff48c940ed9d4e6d05d6.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/16/0xc7ff1e126cc81e816915ff48c940ed9d4e6d05d6.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/16/0xc7ff1e126cc81e816915ff48c940ed9d4e6d05d6.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/16/0xc7ff1e126cc81e816915ff48c940ed9d4e6d05d6.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
